## Simple 'Hello World' Program

```{python}
print("Hello, World!")
```


```{python}
def hello_world():
    print("Hello, World!")

# Call the function
hello_world()

```

## Simple Operators

```{python}
100+100
```


```{python}
x = 9 * 9
print(x)
```


```{python}
x = 300 - x
print(x)
```

## Other Example

```{python}
for countdown in 5, 4, 3, 2, 1, "0":
    print(countdown)
```


```{python}
for countdown in 5, 4, 3, 2, 1, "0":
  if countdown == "0":
    print("Got You")
```
